column4: are there any lightweight rss readers (hell, preferably all it has is a tray icon that notifies me of new entries) for GNOME? I don't feel like grabbing a couple hundred megs of KDE libs along with Akregator
Opera has it built-in, and also there's liferea, which seems to be good.
(not sure if it has a tray icon)
cool, I'll have a look. Thanks... Also found this through apt for anyone that is interested: 'yarssr - RSS reader for the notification area'
